testsuite.name: A Rack app using Zuul TokenDecoder

testcase.name: A Rack app using Zuul TokenDecoder with no token the request environment should not have key starting with "zuul."
A Rack app using Zuul TokenDecoder with a valid but unsigned token the request environment should have key "zuul.access_token"
A Rack app using Zuul TokenDecoder with a valid but unsigned token the request environment should have key "zuul.error"
A Rack app using Zuul TokenDecoder with a valid but unsigned token the request environment should not have key starting with "zuul.user"
A Rack app using Zuul TokenDecoder with a valid but unsigned token the request environment should not have key starting with "zuul.client"
A Rack app using Zuul TokenDecoder with an invalid token the request environment should have key "zuul.access_token"
A Rack app using Zuul TokenDecoder with an invalid token the request environment should have key "zuul.error"
A Rack app using Zuul TokenDecoder with an invalid token the request environment should not have key starting with "zuul.user"
A Rack app using Zuul TokenDecoder with an invalid token the request environment should not have key starting with "zuul.client"
